import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-job-opening-detail', templateUrl: './job-opening-detail.component.html', styleUrls: ['./job-opening-detail.component.css'] }) export class JobOpeningDetailComponent { jobOpening = { title: 'Java Developer 1', description: 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Proin vel justo eu orci fermentum ullamcorper.', requirements: ['Experience in XYZ', 'Strong communication skills'], responsibilities: ['Manage XYZ tasks', 'Collaborate with ABC team'], experience: '3+ years in java', shift:'10:30am - 7:30pm', status: ['Active'] }; viewCandidates() { throw new Error('Method not implemented.'); } addCandidates() { throw new Error('Method not implemented.'); } }
